text: Heinrich Gollwitzer (born 30 October 1923) is a German former sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre rapid fire pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==Olympic Games== 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, competing for the United Team of Germany: * Shooting – Men's 25 metre rapid fire pistol – 20th place ==References== ==External links== * Category:1923 births Category:Possibly living people Category:German male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United Team of Germany Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nuremberg
title: Heinrich Gollwitzer
